noticeData.postContent: The GMs challenge you. Do you accept or are you chicken? Cheep chip chip cheeep!

noticeData.postTitle: FOR THE LOVE OF THE KILL FOR THE LOVE OF THE KILL FOR THE LOVE OF THE KILL FOR THE LOVE OF THE KILL
noticeData.postContent: Is your love for battle greater than all others?

Attention! The SEA GMs each have a challenge for you to undertake in exchange for rewards and glory! Let's see if you are truly worth their respect...



Duration:



14 Feb - 21 Feb (Signup phase) 21 Feb - 14 Mar (Challenge phase)

Gong Xi Fa Cai, mercs! Prosperous times await this Lunar New Year! Accomplish these three objectives during Chinese New Year to receive rewards:

Duration: 4,5,6 Feb

A lovely Valentine’s season to you, mercs. Check out the patch notes for our February update.

Valentine’s Seasonal Items

New weapons have been added to the Gachaboxes and Shop:

Gachabox
-AWP Monkey King (Tier 5)
-AKS74U Molten (Tier 5)
-M4A1 Kitty (Tier 5)
-Heart Grenade (Tier 5)

Shop
-M870 Rose (Tier 3)
-M24 Rising Heart (Tier 4)
-MP5K Rising Heart (Tier 4)
-Bloody Rose (Tier 4)
-Love Mask
-Multi Weapon + (Bonus Weapon Slot, Movement Speed and Weapon Switch Speed)

Vintage Firepower

These classic weapons have been beefed up and returned to the Shop:

-AK47 (Tier 4)
-K2 (Tier 4)
-FAMAS (Tier 4)
-Type64 (Tier 3)
-Type89 (Tier 3)
-PSG-1 (Tier 4)
-T5000 (Tier 4)
-M21 (Tier 3)

Level Generation 2

Level Generation 2 has been introduced. Players who surpass G 1.99 will receive the following rewards:
-M4 Omega 3d
-McMillan Omega 3d
-Barrett Omega 3d
-AK47 SRM Omega 3d
-Glock Dual White 3d

Competitive Mode Season 7

-Season 7 now includes Scopes and Silencers in higher tier rewards. Go here for a full list of rewards.

-Season 6 Maps
SD: Hans Cargo, Plaza
TFM: Ancient Collection, The Hunting
WR: Safe House, Radar Station
